name: Netman
desc: Netman is an application that is meant to show off many networking concepts through a collection of mini-to-medium sized projects. There is currently only one project implemented: the multiroom chat application.
background: During the winter break of my 3rd year at UNT, I really wanted to apply one of the concepts that I learned about.
features:
• Real-time messaging
  • User authentication and login
  • Typing indicators
  • Read receipts
  • Group chats
  • Direct (one-on-one) messaging
  • Media sharing (images, videos, files)
  • Push notifications
  • Online/offline status
  • Message search functionality
  • Message reactions (like emojis)
  • Chat history and persistence
  • End-to-end encryption
  • User profiles and avatars
  • Admin controls for groups
  • Message editing and deletion
  • Customizable chat themes or backgrounds
